SEARCH
Package controller

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
controller.OrderController
public class OrderController extends Object
The OrderController class handles operations related to orders and order lines. It provides methods for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving orders, as well as managing the relationship between customers and their orders.
Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

      Throws:

      IllegalArgumentException - if the order is null or has missing required fields

      customer - the customer associated with the order
      Returns:

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart(Product product, Client clienteActual, int cantidad) throws IllegalStateException, SQLException
      Adds a product to the customer's cart. If no pending order exists, a new order is created.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be added to the cart
      clienteActual - the customer who is adding the product
      cantidad - the quantity of the product to be added
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there is an issue with the current state of the order
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • finalizeOrder

      public void finalizeOrder(Client customer, PaymentMethod paymentMethod) throws SQLException
      Finalizes an order for a customer and sets its state to FINISHED.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer who is finalizing the order
      paymentMethod - the payment method used for the order
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      IllegalArgumentException - if no pending order is found for the customer

    • deliverOrder

      public void deliverOrder(int id) throws SQLException
      Marks an order as delivered in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the order to be delivered
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • cancelOrder

      public void cancelOrder(Client customer) throws SQLException
      Cancels a pending order for a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer whose pending order is to be canceled
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
